original_text: If I have rewarded evil unto him that was at peace with me; (yea, I have delivered him that without cause is mine enemy:)
korean_text: 화친한 자를 악으로 갚았거나 내 대적에게서 까닭 없이 빼앗았거든

sentences.original_text: unto him that was at peace with me
that without cause is mine enemy
sentences.korean_translation: 까닭 없이 나의 원수가 된 자를
